Trade/Device Name(s): Healgen® Accurate Fentanyl Rapid Test Dip Card (Urine)
Healgen® Accurate Rapid Fentanyl Test Dip Card (Urine)
Healgen® Accurate Fentanyl Rapid Test Strip (Urine)
Healgen® Accurate Rapid Fentanyl Test Strip (Urine)
Healgen® Accurate Fentanyl Rapid Test Cassette (Urine)
Healgen® Accurate Rapid Fentanyl Test Cassette (Urine)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Healgen® Accurate Fentanyl Rapid Test in cassette, dip card, and strip formats for qualitative detection of fentanyl in human urine
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of fentanyl in human urine at a cutoff concentration of 1.0 ng/mL; provides preliminary results requiring confirmation by GC/MS or LC/MS.
